name: neuralquest_
description:
What are you?

Where have you been?

What is this monitor in front of you?

Are you a knight?

You got plenty of questions to solve in this dialogue, keep moving forward and never surrender.

For you to decide what is real and what is not.

Developers: GroundDoon - Gamedesign, Story, Code; Cyanscarf, KRAB - Art; Xordazh - Music.
